info.abstract:
The Bar Chart component allows you to visualize data using bar chart.
See demo workflow.
info.description: This component allows you to visualize data using bar chart.
info.inputs: A tab-delimited or comma-separated text file: contains data to be visualized.

ul.li: A pdf file with bar chart plot
X Axis: choose the column for the x-axis of your bar chart.
Y Axis: choose the column for the y-axis of your bar chart. The values in this column have to numeric.
Title for Bar Chart: enter a title for your bar chart.
Include Faceting Group: choose Yes or No to include facet group for your bar chart.
Faceting Group: choose the column as faceting group.
Include Standard Error Bar: choose Yes or No to add error bar to your bar chart.

Standard Deviation: choose the column for standard deviation. The component will compute the standard error based on formular: standard-deviation/square_root(sample_size). Learnsphere's Pivot Workflow component provides an easy way to compute standard deviation.

Sample Size: choose the column for sample size. The component will compute the standard error based on formular: standard-deviation/square_root(sample_size). Learnsphere's Pivot Eorkflow component provides an easy way to compute sample size.

p.b: This example shows how to summarize data using Pivot component and visualize the summary data using Bar Chart component.

ol.li: Use 3 Pivot components to compute sd (standard deviation), count (sample size), and mean for column "exam", separately. All three pivot components use "condition" and "Group" for rows.
Use 2 Join components to join the results of the Pivot components.
Use a Column Operations component to change column names for the result of the Join components.

Finally use a Bar Chart component to visualize the summary result:
X Axis: choose "Group" column.
Y Axis: choose "mean" column.
Title for Bar Chart: enter "Exam mean for A/B group under control and experimental conditions".
Include Faceting Group: choose "Yes".
Faceting Group: choose "condition".
Include Standard Error Bar: choose "Yes".
Standard Deviation: choose "sd".
Sample Size: choose "count".
